subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में कौन सा महत्त्वनाथ है?
C_en: Cenotaph of Sawai Jai Singh I

explanation_en: Hawa Mahal, also known as "Palace of Winds", is a famous landmark in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It is a five-storied building made of pink sandstone and has been a popular tourist attraction since its construction in the early 19th century.
explanation_hi: हवा महाल, "हैवा महाल" के नाम किसे कहा गया है? इसका नईपुर, राजस्थान में एक फ़्यात्र कहा गया है। इसका नईपुर, राजस्थान में एक फ़्यात्र किया गया है। यह नईपुर, राजस्थान में एक फ़्यात्र किया गया है।
explanation_en: The Jantar Mantar in Jaipur, Rajasthan is a famous astronomical observatory built by Maharaja Jai Singh II in the 18th century. It was declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1987.
